detailsData.title: Easy Navigation
detailsData.content: We make it easy to navigate the bureaucratic court system. You answer simple questions online in 20 minutes or less.

detailsData.title: Printing & Mailing
detailsData.content: We take care of all the printing & mailing of your court documents when filing & serving. We can even print your evidence and mail it to you, the court, and the other party for you!

detailsData.title: Hearing Preparation
detailsData.content: Increase your chances of winning by being prepared. We help you prepare for your hearing with an organized evidence packet.

detailsData.title: Attorney Review
detailsData.content: Get suggestions for your evidence by having an attorney review your court documents and evidence before going to court.

subHeading: We have your back with Small Claims Court
valueProp: At People Clerk, you come first. You will always have access to our team via email ([email protected]). We know that navigating small claims is intimidating, but we are here to help.

testimonalData.text: Wow. What an amazing resource. Making the all important tool of small claims court accessible to everyone.
They were extremely helpful with my small claims case. Very well organized and the website was simple to use.
Using People Court to help you navigate through the small claims process is a no-brainer! They make it so easy and are great to work with.
